trans-unit.source: Provides a collection of <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> methods that return information about the common language runtime environment.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller en mängd <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""> </xref> metoder som returnerar information om vanliga språk-körningsmiljön.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified assembly is loaded in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: Testar om den angivna sammansättningen har lästs in i den globala sammansättningscachen.

trans-unit.source: The assembly to test.
trans-unit.target: Sammansättning som ska testas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the assembly is loaded in the global assembly cache; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om sammansättningen är inläst i den globala sammansättningscachen; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the directory where the common language runtime is installed.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar katalogen där common language runtime är installerad.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the directory where the common language runtime is installed.
trans-unit.target: En sträng som innehåller sökvägen till katalogen där common language runtime är installerad.

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified interface on the specified class.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar det angivna gränssnittet på den angivna klassen.

trans-unit.source: This method is similar to calling the method on the interface that represents this runtime.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden liknar att anropa metoden i gränssnittet som representerar den här runtime.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the supported combinations for `clsid` and `riid`.
trans-unit.target: Följande tabell visar kombinationerna som stöds för `clsid` och `riid`.

trans-unit.source: |`clsid`|`riid`| |-------------|------------| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenser|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntime|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorRuntimeHost|IID_CorRuntimeHost| |CLSID_CLRRuntimeHost|IID_CLRRuntimeHost (not valid for the common language runtime that is provided by the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]), IID_CLRRuntimeHost3| |CLSID_TypeNameFactory|IID_TypeNameFactory| |CLSID_CLRStrongName|IID_CLRStrongName| GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr is similar to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: | `clsid`|`riid`| |-------------|------------| | CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenser | IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx | | CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntime | IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx | | CLSID_CorRuntimeHost | IID_CorRuntimeHost | | CLSID_CLRRuntimeHost | IID_CLRRuntimeHost (gäller inte för CLR som tillhandahålls av den [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]), IID_CLRRuntimeHost3 | | CLSID_TypeNameFactory | IID_TypeNameFactory | | CLSID_CLRStrongName | IID_CLRStrongName | GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr liknar den <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the desired class.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare för önskad klass.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the desired interface.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare för önskad-gränssnittet.

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged pointer to the requested interface.
trans-unit.target: Ohanterad pekare till det begärda gränssnittet.

trans-unit.source: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867) failure.
trans-unit.target: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867) fel.

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of a type that represents a COM object by a pointer to its <xref uid="langword_csharp_IUnknown" name="IUnknown" href=""></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en instans av en typ som representerar ett COM-objekt med en pekare till dess <xref uid="langword_csharp_IUnknown" name="IUnknown" href=""> </xref> gränssnitt.

trans-unit.source: GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject is similar to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: GetRuntimeInterfaceAsObject liknar den <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeEnvironment.GetRuntimeInterfaceAsIntPtr%2A>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the desired class.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare för önskad klass.

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the desired interface.
trans-unit.target: Identifierare för önskad-gränssnittet.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the specified unmanaged COM object.
trans-unit.target: Ett objekt som representerar det angivna ohanterade COM-objektet.

trans-unit.source: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867) failure.
trans-unit.target: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867) fel.

trans-unit.source: Gets the version number of the common language runtime that is running the current process.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar versionsnumret för CLR som den aktuella processen körs.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the version number of the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: En sträng som innehåller versionsnumret för CLR.

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the system configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar sökväg till konfigurationsfilen på systemet.

trans-unit.source: The path to the system configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Sökväg till konfigurationsfilen på systemet.
